name: Project Star (8 Bit Simple)
description:
In Project Star you'll start with a basic crop plane with no guns and shoot your way to building a starship worthy of space!

Features!
Rogue-lite mechanics that'll keep you coming back for my shooting!
A fun and simple upgrade system for unique play styles and runs!
Diverse cast of enemies so shooting doesn't grow stale!
Bopping music by NeetCat to fly and blast too!
Awesome graphics brought to you by Kenney via his Ship Mixer Tool!

[This game will proceed to be FREE, if I used your assets with the belief it was good and you don't like it. Please contact me and I'll remove them at your request.]
